Reviews

What do customers say about us?

Ratings from recent customers

I fell victim to an online scam and was devastated. This company was a beacon of hope. They guided me through every step and successfully charged back my money. Highly professional and empathetic team.

John Smith Traveler and Photographer

I was scammed while shopping online. This company recovered my money quickly and efficiently. Their constant updates and professionalism were outstanding. Highly recommended!

Sarah Johnson Online Shopper

After being scammed on a tech purchase, I turned to this company. Their expertise and dedication were impressive. They recovered my funds and provided excellent customer service.

Michael Brown Tech Enthusiast
Chargeback LTD is an outstanding money recovery company. I was a victim of a complex online investment scam.
David ThompsonTechnology Enthusiast
Their team is very patient and answered all my questions in detail. As someone who enjoys reading about true crime.
Lilly MitchellFounder Makko
Chargeback LTD provided exceptional service in helping me recover my money from a binary options scam.
Cameron McdonaldBusiness Manager MoxPay

Who we are

Chargeback LTD is one of the leading chargeback firms worldwide

Specializing in online trading scams (Forex, Binary Options, Crypto, etc), we pride ourselves on having one of the highest success rates in the industry. We are also known for our no-nonsense approach to confronting scammers in the effort to bring our clients’ money back.

Wallet Fund Tracing

You can do away with all of your chargeback issues and establish better rapport with your customers.

Due Diligence

We help you to perform your due diligence the right way – when you are investing into buying a business.

Debt Settlement Services

We will provide you with trusted debt settlement services that will actually get you out of the problem.

7+
Years of Experience
(1st quarter)

Money retrieved in 2023

Our team of experts secures refunds on a daily basis. We assist businesses as well as individuals in their pursuit of funds lost to scammers. Our goal is to continually improve in our endeavors and we are always here to help you in your fight for what is rightfully yours.

Get your money back
